mapper.select: select article_id, article_name, article_releasetime from article where article_status = 1 order by article_releasetime desc
select b_id,b_enabletimetask,b_timetask from bulletin where b_status = 0 and b_enabletimetask = 1 and b_timetask != 'null'
mapper.insert: insert into article( article_name, article_author, article_content, article_createtime, article_browsenum, article_lovenum, article_istop, article_status, article_enabletimetask, article_timetask ) values ( #{name}, #{author}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{browseNum}, #{loveNum}, #{isTop}, #{status}, #{enableTimeTask}, #{timeTask} )
mapper.update: update article set article_status=0 article_enabletimetask = 0 article_timetask='null' where article_id=#{id}
